<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/interactions/{interactionGuid}/notes"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve the notes attached to an interaction

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
